mapper.select: SELECT S.*, C.ANIMALNAME, E.EMPNAME FROM SURGERY S INNER JOIN CUSTOMER C ON S.CUSTOMERNO=C.CUSTOMERNO INNER JOIN EMP E ON S.USERNAME=E.USERNAME INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPTNO = D.DEPTNO

SELECT E.USERNAME, E.EMPNAME, E.DEPTNO, D.DEPTNAME , P.POSITIONNAME FROM EMP E INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPTNO = D.DEPTNO INNER JOIN POSITION P ON E.POSITIONNO = P.POSITIONNO WHERE P.POSITIONNO BETWEEN 2 AND 6
SELECT S.*, C.ANIMALNAME, C.NAME, E.USERNAME, E.EMPNAME FROM SURGERY S INNER JOIN CUSTOMER C ON S.CUSTOMERNO=C.CUSTOMERNO INNER JOIN EMP E ON S.USERNAME=E.USERNAME WHERE SURGERYNO=#{surgeryNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE SURGERY SET SURGERYSTART=#{surgeryStart}, SURGERYEND=#{surgeryEnd}, SURGERYROOM=#{surgeryRoom}, SURGERYNAME=#{surgeryName}, CUSTOMERNO=#{customerNo}, USERNAME=#{userName} WHERE SURGERYNO=#{surgeryNo}
